subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin is 12 points behind Tony Stewart for the seventh spot and acknowledges that he struggles with the temptation of matching the aggressive driving styles of those behind him in the points chase.
snippet: Denny Hamlin is 12 points behind Tony Stewart for the seventh spot and acknowledges that he struggles with the temptation of matching the aggressive driving styles of those behind him in the points chase.
